summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the Alley in Block 5, Ridgewood Addition, being the alley between 34th Avenue Southwest and 35th Avenue Southwest from West Findlay Street to West Juneau Street, and certain other streets and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16515 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
